sentences.sentence: An icosahedron with twenty equilateral triangles as faces.
sentences.translation: 有二十个正三角形面的二十面体。

sentences.sentence: Because of the symmetrical shell structure of the icosahedron, the distribution of the ionic kinetic energy features some pinnacles.
sentences.translation: 由于正二十面体的对称壳层结构，离子动能分布具有尖峰结构。

sentences.sentence: The 20-sided shape (an icosahedron) floats to the window and one of the 20 answers is visible, telling you the answer to your question.
sentences.translation: 这个有着20个面的形状(一个20面体)浮到窗口上，20个答案中的其中一个是可见的，告诉您问题的答案。
